unnormalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Got You Down? Diwali Biryani May Cost More!**
normalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Got You Down? Diwali Biryani May Cost More!**

unnormalised: Hey there, folks! Remember when we thought petrol prices were bad? Well, brace yourselves. Your domestic gas cylinder (LPG) prices are doing the chaal-baazari again!
normalised: Hey there, folks! Remember when we thought petrol prices were bad? Well, brace yourselves. Your domestic gas cylinder (L P G) prices are doing the chaal-baazari again!

unnormalised: Reports coming in say that after a period of relative calm, we might see another hike before Diwali. Yep, that means your favourite Diwali snacks, and that amazing biryani your aunty makes, are about to get a tad more expensive.
normalised: Reports coming in say that after a period of relative calm, we might see another hike before Diwali. Yep, that means your favourite Diwali snacks, and that amazing biryani your aunty makes, are about to get a tad more expensive.

unnormalised: Sources whisper that the increase could be around Rs. 50 per cylinder. Not a massive jump, but it pinches, right? Especially with inflation already hitting the poori-bhaji budget.
normalised: Sources whisper that the increase could be around rupees fifty per cylinder. Not a massive jump, but it pinches, right? Especially with inflation already hitting the poori-bhaji budget.

unnormalised: The reason? Blame it on global energy market volatility and "international bhai-log" controlling the prices.
normalised: The reason? Blame it on global energy market volatility and "international bhai-log" controlling the prices.

unnormalised: The Oil Ministry is currently mum, but analysts at ICICI Securities predict a tricky next few months. Let’s hope this isn't another 'shock laga' moment!
normalised: The Oil Ministry is currently mum, but analysts at I C I C I Securities predict a tricky next few months. Let’s hope this isn't another 'shock laga' moment!

unnormalised: Keep an eye on your Indane and Bharat Gas bills, folks. And maybe start practicing those cost-saving Onam sadhya recipes. Every little bit helps!
normalised: Keep an eye on your Indane and Bharat Gas bills, folks. And maybe start practicing those cost-saving Onam sadhya recipes. Every little bit helps!
